EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for registering to attend the PDS in MD, Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series, Thank you for registering - DC/MD - Oct 2007
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation to attend ASA's Partnership Dialogue Series!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering to attend ASA’s Partnership Dialogue Series: A Focus on Communication.
Date: Thursday, October 11, 2007 Start Time: 8:30 am Location:University of Maryland, College Park Crist Room, Samuel Riggs IV Alumni Center Building College Park, MD 20742 http://www.umd.edu/visitors/#directions
(Parking – we recommend parking in The Stadium Drive parking garage adjacent to the Samuel Riggs IV Alumni Center Building. Parking vouchers will be provided at the event)
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your registration please email training@amsa.com or 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099.
We look forward to seeing you!
